one of the downsides to only having LPG is that all the

or a cafe Amazon so whenever we go to get fuel we cant have anything else
at these big stations they have everything you need, coffee

ice cocoa, no hot coffee for me today

Road a motorbike up this road 9 years ago

nine years ago, nine years ago me not
been on this road since
as i was coming up here i was like, i recognize this
nine years, almost a decade, and we are here again now In our own car with our dog, its pretty cool
weeeeeeeeeeeeee

so we are currently driving the windy roads to Chiang Dao
almost halfway through our road trip
Its a really really hazy morning
smokey burning season is in full force
hopefully it will get a bit better and the views will get nicer but, stop the burning!
had to stop the film this, this little section of road
in chiang Dao has some of the most interesting looking mountains in the north
because its so hazy you cant see any of the details
such a shame, thats why i love the rainy season so much
when it's rainy season yeah it might be a bit wet sometimes
you get lovely puffy clouds in the sky
you get to see everything in clear detail, it just looks so much nicer
theres so much beauty, so close by, i could look out at it for hours
soon the rains will come, and we will be back to beautiful thailand again
Back on the road
we are on a mid road trip lunch stop
we are currently at chiang dao nest, which is a place weve wanted to come to for a while now.
check this out it is beautiful

climb

so peaceful, just listen to the birds
peace

theres another one there behind that bush
they have accommodation here for people who want to stay, but its not pet friendly so thats why we havent stayed here before
because of this black dog
we have not been able to stay here as of yet
they have cats, and theres goats there so maybe they wont get on

you can see the mountain, such a massive mountain

not the tallest mountain in Thailand
but definitely one of the most interesting ones
we have read that its possible to climb this mountain but you have to do it with a tour guide
or with some kind of special permission, like you have to email them first
because its meant to be quite a dangerous climb
so we'll look into that and maybe it might be one of the future videos
love climbing mountains
j missed out on climbing mount kinabalu with me in borneo, so we'll see if we can do this one
